'''Summer Festival Fish''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Tricolor Dango]] with [[Yoimiya]]. The [[recipe]] for Tricolor Dango is obtained from [[Kiminami Anna]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Summer Festival Fish restores '''40%''' of Max HP and an additional '''2,350''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
